column1: You may have some pain and soreness in your neck at first, especially when you swallow.
Or, you may take over-the-counter pain medicine, such as ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin) or acetaminophen (Tylenol).
You may put a cold compress on your surgical cut for 20 minutes at a time to ease pain and swelling.
If: - The incision was covered with skin glue, you may shower with soap the day after surgery.
- Your incision was covered with tape, put plastic wrap over the area while you shower for the first week.
Cover your incision with clothing or very strong sunscreen when you are in the sun for the first year after surgery.
An endocrinologist is a doctor who treats problems with glands and hormones.
